name: How I Got Here
description:
Control: Arrow Keys & Space Bar
ART: Angelo Sanchez
PROGRAMMER: Angelo Sanchez
Music: Bensound.com

A class project where we had to play the game in reverse to win. This was my idea on that take, by reversing everything about the game from its controller to how you win the game. The player's controls are reversed for this project and the way the player progress through the game is also reversed, which is from left to right.
